title: Horace Silver - The Jody Grind (1966) FLAC 24/96 Vinyl
description:
The Jody Grind is a 1966 recording by the Horace Silver Quintet, led by jazz pianist Horace Silver. Released the following year on his lifetime label Blue Note, it peaked No. 8 of the Billboard jazz album charts.
